com.jswiff.swfrecords
Class ShapeWithStyle

java.lang.Object
  com.jswiff.swfrecords.Shape
      com.jswiff.swfrecords.ShapeWithStyle
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public final class ShapeWithStyle
extends Shape

This class extends the Shape class by including fill and line styles. Like the Shape class, ShapeWithStyle also contains one or more ShapeRecord instances which define style changes and primitives as lines and curves. Used within DefineShape, DefineShape2 and DefineShape3.

See Also:
DefineShape, DefineShape2, DefineShape3, Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

ShapeWithStyle

public ShapeWithStyle(FillStyleArray fillStyles,
                      LineStyleArray lineStyles,
                      ShapeRecord[] shapeRecords)
Creates a new ShapeWithStyle instance. Supply a fill and line style array and an array of shape records. The style arrays must contain less than 256 styles when used within a DefineShape tag.

Parameters:
fillStyles - fill style array
lineStyles - line style array
shapeRecords - shape record array
